verses.text: \w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* extol \w you|strong="H1004"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, because \w you|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1004"\w* \w lifted|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H1004"\w* up, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* suffered \w my|strong="H1732"\w* foes \w to|strong="H1004"\w* rejoice \w over|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* cried \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* help, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* healed \w me|strong="H7311"\w*.

You \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* me up, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w from|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol, \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* way \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* pit back \w to|strong="H3068"\w* life you \w have|strong="H3068"\w* called me.

Sing praise \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, faithful \w people|strong="H5315"\w*; \w give|strong="H2421"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy name.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* anger lasts only \w a|strong="H3068"\w* moment, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w favor|strong="H3068"\w* endures \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lifetime. Weeping \w may|strong="H3068"\w* lodge \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* night, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* morning brings shouts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* joy.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3885"\w* went well, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* imagined \w that|strong="H3588"\w* never \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H2416"\w* shaken.

\w For|strong="H4131"\w* \w by|strong="H1077"\w* \w your|strong="H5769"\w* favor, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w you|strong="H5769"\w* had set \w me|strong="H5769"\w* on mountains strong: \w but|strong="H4131"\w* \w you|strong="H5769"\w* hide \w your|strong="H5769"\w* face, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w I|strong="H7959"\w* was confounded.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w I|strong="H6440"\w* cried, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* begged \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*,

“What profit \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* blood, \w if|strong="H2603"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* pit? Can \w you|strong="H7121"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* praised \w by|strong="H3068"\w* dust? Can \w it|strong="H7121"\w* tell \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness?

\w Hear|strong="H5046"\w*, 
d Lord
d*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w show|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w your|strong="H5046"\w* favor, 
d Lord
d* \w be|strong="H1818"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* helper \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*.”

\w You|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* mourning \w to|strong="H3068"\w* dancing; \w my|strong="H8085"\w* sackcloth \w you|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* unloosed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* clothed \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* joy:

that unceasingly I should sing \w your|strong="H6605"\w* praise, \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w give|strong="H2015"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H2015"\w* \w you|strong="H8057"\w*, \nd Lord\nd* \w my|strong="H6605"\w* God, forever.
